flawed_nl_solution:
The canvases cost $40 and she spent half that amount on paint so she spent 40/2 = $<<40/2=20>>20 on paint
She spent $40 on canvases, $20 on paint and $15 on an easel so she spent 40+20+15 = $<<40+20+15=79>>79
She spent $90 total and her other purchases totaled $79 so she spent 90-79 = $<<90-79=11>>11 on paint brushes
#### 11

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 75, not 79. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
